message.content:
cs.MS, cs.CE, cs.NA, cs.SI, cs.DC

The paper describes an upgraded platform for scientific modelling and simulation, which involves generating numerical simulation code for a wide range of models. This could fall under several arXiv CS sub-categories, but the most likely ones are cs.MS (Mathematical Software) and cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science), as the paper deals with developing software for scientific simulations. Additionally, the paper mentions support for partial differential equations, which could fall under cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) or cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). Finally, the paper mentions an agent-based model family, which could fall under cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing).
